Dear CCPIB,

Please stop HKBN from partnering with Television Broadcast Ltd.

I am writing to lodge a formal complaint against HKBN’s partnership with pro-Beijing TV channel of Hong Kong.

As one of the loyal customers of HKBN, network service provided by HKBN is highly appreciated and is reputable among the industry. However, the bundled contract of installing myTV SUPER box is an unreasonable agreement, if not absurd, to force customers paying for undesirable installations.

Controversy on extradition bill sparked shockwaves among society and escalated to a large-scale social campaign for over half a year. Instead of upholding Code of Ethics of journalists, TVB adopted the approach of distortion, news suppression and censorship. Unfairness, inaccuracy and conjecture is now the image presented by the news of TVB. The majority of Hong Kong citizens have resentment and grudges against TVB and boycott the brands that appear on TVB advertisement, as well as their business partners.

Being a socially responsible company that cares about human right, I believe CPPBI is an enterprise which will always stand with us. Stopping the partnership with TVB will not only benefit the customers but also the image of CPPBI and HKBN. I herewith strongly urge HKBN to stop providing any service option bundled with myTV SUPER, otherwise, I will consider advance termination of contract as one of my options if the suggestion above is not accepted.

Thank you and I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Yours sincerely,
A HK citizen and a HKBN customer
